title: After the Fire (Chisa Hawkins, Vernard Millner)
description:
Myth: Fire destroys everything. 
In a double homicide-turned-arson case, investigators uncover evidence that turns up the heat on a jealous ex-lover.

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
